name: putarel
description: My first web app for warehouse to log cargoes that has been PGI or packed, but not yet collected by forwarder. These cargoes are normally all put in a same location called PACKED or STAGE. So it will be hard to find them when forwarder comes to collect

scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build

author: Jie Yong
